effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Fortifying Brew for 6.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: When you gain  Luck of the Draw!, your next 2 casts of Blackout Kick deal 250% increased damage and incur a 2.0 sec reduced cooldown.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 85 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call a member of the Goon Squad to attack your target for 10 sec. Gaining Bloodlust or a similar effect summons the whole crew.

name: Geargrinder's Spare Keys

spells.description: Use: Launch a Geargrinder trike to its final blaze of glory, exploding upon impacting the first enemy in its path to deal 1.8 million Fire damage split between all nearby enemies. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: I'm gonna step on the gas!

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
